q: How fast can we see results?
a: Most clients see clearer positioning and stronger engagement in the first 2-3 weeks. Pipeline results depend on consistency and offer strength.

q: Do you only work with LinkedIn?
a: LinkedIn is the core channel, but we can repurpose into short-form, carousels, and ads once the content system is working.

q: What do you need from me to start?
a: Your offer, target audience, past wins (even small), and 2-3 example creators/brands you like. We'll handle the system + execution.

q: Do you handle posting and scheduling?
a: Yes, depending on the package. We can write, design, edit, schedule, and optimize.
We don't do random posting. We build a repeatable inbound system: strategy + creation + proof + iteration + conversion.
